alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Madison; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:51AM EDT until April 01 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Brown County in southwestern Ohio... Southeastern Warren County in southwestern Ohio... Fayette County in central Ohio... Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Southeastern Greene County in west central Ohio... Highland County in southwestern Ohio... Southern Madison County in central Ohio... * Until 230 AM EDT. * At 151 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Sabina to Blanchester, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Blanchester, Sabina, Jamestown, Mount Sterling, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Jeffersonville, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Highland Holiday, Rocky Fork Point, Russell, Woodville, Staunton and New Market. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 48 and 87. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southwestern and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southwestern and west central Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Madison; Warren
